revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Meteor Falls |image = [[File:Meteor Falls.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Meteor Falls. |tokens = 18,000 |location = North of Route 115. }} '''Meteor Falls''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 443,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=5|[[File:Old_Couple.png|40px]] Old Couple John and Jay || rowspan=5|[[File:Medicham.png|40px]] Medicham, [[File:Hariyama.png|40px]] Hariyama |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Solrock.png|40px]] Solrock || <center> rowspan=2|1,240,000 || rowspan=2|[[File:Dragon_Tamer.png|40px]] Dragon Tamer Nicolas || rowspan=2|[[File:Altaria.png|40px]] Altaria, [[File:Altaria.png|40px]] Altaria || rowspan=2|<center> 640,000 |- | [[File:Lunatone.png|40px]] Lunatone |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
